tool_description: Analyzes A/B test results for player engagement and retention experiments, calculating statistical significance, effect sizes, and providing recommendations for test conclusions.

experiment_data.description: A/B test experiment data with control and treatment groups

control_group.description: Player IDs in the control group

primary_metric.description: Primary metric for the A/B test analysis

significance_level.description: Statistical significance level for hypothesis testing

error_messages: Insufficient experiment data: Need data for both control and treatment groups.
Empty control group: At least one player required in control group.
Empty treatment groups: At least one player required in treatment groups.
Invalid primary metric: Must specify a valid metric name for analysis.
Invalid significance level: Must be between 0.01 and 0.10.
Overlapping groups: Players cannot be in both control and treatment groups.
usage: Provide experiment_data, control_group, treatment_groups, and primary_metric. Optionally add secondary_metrics and set significance_level. Returns statistical analysis with significance tests and recommendations.

statistical_significance.description: Whether the test results are statistically significant

p_value.description: P-value for the primary metric comparison

confidence_interval.description: Confidence interval for the treatment effect
